channel.title: Campus on PlaceOS
channel.description: Recent content in Campus on PlaceOS

item.title: Canadian University Campus - Energy Reduction & Sustainability
item.description: This pilot examined the implementation of PlaceOS for automating and synchronizing separate building systems—security access, HVAC, AV, and others—integrated with the university’s scheduling system. The goal was to transform classrooms into smart spaces through enhanced automation capabilities.

item.title: Building & Region-Level Workplace Management
item.description: Control workplace settings to standardize policies across buildings, so you can scale workplace management while ensuring the right settings for each location.

item.title: A Guide to Energy Data Collection & Utilization
item.description: How to collect energy data in commercial buildings so that you can find out where you’re wasting energy like powering empty spaces.

item.title: Webinar: Campus Management Systems with Cisco Meraki
item.description: Learn how campus management systems leverage occupancy data like Cisco Meraki so that you’re not powering empty classrooms on campus.

item.title: Partnership announcement with Monstarlab

item.title: LIVE EVENT: Rethinking Campus Experience
item.description: Discover smart campus solutions to enhance the campus experience. Learn how a campus app can streamline operations and improve student engagement.

item.title: Size Does Matter: The 2% Topping the Energy Charts
item.description: Uncover the secrets of the top 2% in commercial real estate. Achieve energy reduction and lower energy consumption with expert insights. Find out how today!

item.title: Three reasons I am not working from home
item.description: Discover three compelling reasons not to work from home. Learn why returning to the office can boost productivity, collaboration, and overall job satisfaction.

item.title: LIVE DEMO: Indoor Wayfinding & Workplace Management Overhaul
item.description: A brand new feature powered by a new integration. An overhaul of our workplace management application.

item.title: £93bn of Commercial Real Estate is at Risk, Here’s What To Do
item.description: Unlocking sustainability: UK’s mandate & PlaceOS’s smart energy solutions reshape real estate’s future.

item.title: When to go with a custom or packaged smart building solution
item.description: When it comes to smart building solutions, choosing when to go custom or packaged is difficult. Here’s how to approach it.

item.title: StageHand
item.description: AV control that works without third-party controllers
